items.content_html: 📝 Simple Form with Zustand & Dexie A lightweight React form using Zustand for state management and Dexie.js for local data storage. 🚀 Features ✔ Efficient state handling with Zustand ✔ Local data persistence via Dexie.js ✔ Simple CRUD operations ✔ Clean and responsive UI 🔧 Tech Stack React, Zustand, Dexie.js, Tailwind CSS (if used)
